title: A post of appreciation to Bioluminescence
body:
Well guys, as we all know, us, fans of the lore of league of legends, we are a little... well, abandoned by riot in a big scale.

BUT, in this recent dark times, were the game is not even canon, where the lore of new champions are a FEW lines, we get a light that show us the end of the, A RIOTER, who show us that someone in riot games still care about us, and tries to help us in this moments with no hope.

Thank you Bioluminescence, i apreciate what you do for us.

replies.body:
Hey, Celio.

It's lovely for you to say that, but really it's no big thing - you're all great people here and I just wanted to have a chat. Just the same as the rest of the gamers here. 

Anyway it feels weird to be talking about me instead of you guys and/or the game!  So, thank YOU, and everyone here for being so welcoming, but let's (as they say in Mulan) get down to business!  :D

Well doubleposted bioluminescence, even having a chat did make is have a little more hope in something i was almost going to drop forever just tired of nothing since... 2013? 2012? long time ago... i am waiting too long to heard something more about my loved Diana...

So yeah, even you, a rioter ouside lore department, is a nice help, even if you don't feel is a big thing, for us it is.
Yeah - sorry for the double post. I'm on my phone, in an airport, and it's not the best way to write on the boards >_<  Apologies!

Some would say,

*You are the light at the end of the tunnel!*

Apparently riot thinks that a wall of text is too much for new players to stomach when starting the game,so they abbreviate it for them.
Faker smurfing on their 1st game level 1 account though,thats perfectly fine.

This is the OLD one, the new one is pretty much nothing.

And i understand that it can be too much for new people, BUT, if you can't show the big one, then DON'T CHANGE IT, WAIT UNTILL YOU CAN DO IT.

Thx Bio amd nice to meet you =) I hope that relations between lore fans and narrative can be mended soon. All that anger has gone on for far too long. I'd like to apologize for everything I wrote. I thought that they could be helpful and serve as an example of how lore fans could try and help narrative keep the characters as close to the original as possible. But I admit that I did let my imagination run loose and it did stray at some point. So, I'm sorry for that. That was why I asked who the original writers were. I thought they'd be able to help you out on this. Perhaps I should have asked thay in a mlre direct manner :p
Bioluminescence might be my favorite rioter. Not the least because they're the only rioter I know of who's from the same state as I am.
